title: Second Follow-Up - Billing Issue Still Unresolved

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: It’s been a week and I still haven’t heard back about my billing dispute.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I’m really sorry for the delay, Mr. Miller. Let me check the status of your case.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: You said it would be resolved within 7 business days. Today is day 7.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: You’re absolutely right. Give me just a moment to pull up the latest notes.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: This is unbelievable. Every time I call, it’s the same story.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I completely understand how frustrating this must be for you.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: You keep saying that but nothing gets done.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I see here that the investigation is still marked as ‘in progress’. I’ll reach out to the team right now.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Why is it taking so long? This is a simple mistake.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: It appears there’s a backlog in the investigations queue. I apologize for the delay.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: I don’t care about your backlog. I care about my bill being fixed.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: You’re absolutely right. Let me escalate this to a priority case immediately.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: You should have done that the first time I called.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: You’re correct, Mr. Miller. I’ll also request a manager to review your case today.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: I expect a resolution by tomorrow.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I’ll push to make that happen, but the standard process can still take a few more days.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: This is unacceptable. I want someone accountable.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I’ve added myself as the point of contact and will personally keep you updated daily.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: You better, because if I don’t hear back soon, I’m filing a complaint.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I understand, and I want to resolve this before it comes to that.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: What exactly are you waiting on? Why can’t you just fix it now?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: We need approval from the compliance team to remove the charges officially.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Then call them while I’m on the line.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Unfortunately, they work via internal queue, but I’ve marked it urgent now.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: You keep using the word ‘urgent’, but nothing changes.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I completely understand how you feel. I assure you, I’ve escalated it as high as possible today.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Fine. But I’m not hanging up until I get confirmation that someone is actually working on it.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I just spoke with a supervisor who confirmed it’s now at the top of their queue.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: And how soon will I hear back?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: You should receive an update within 48 hours. I’ll also call you personally tomorrow with a status update.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Alright. But this is your last chance.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Understood, Mr. Miller. I’ll make sure you’re taken care of.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: We’ll see. Goodbye.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Thank you for your patience, Mr. Miller. Goodbye.
